dialog.npc.carpenter.name: Danny
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.line_0: Hey stranger, my name is Danny. I'm here to help you build the village you're starting in Sunlit Valley.
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.line_1: If you're looking to invite more villagers, come talk to me and I can help you build homes for them.
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.line_2: If you'd prefer to do the building yourself, just let me know and I can give you the invitations and sell any building supplies you'll need.
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.line_3: That's all I have for now, you really have your work cut out for you here. Come see me if you need anything!
